title: Understanding Key Characteristics
text: In research, instruments are tools used to collect, measure, and analyze data. Two essential characteristics ensure that these tools provide accurate and consistent results.

title: Consistency
text: Consider what it means for a research instrument to consistently produce the same results under the same conditions. What characteristic does this describe?

title: Consistent Measurement
text: When designing a research instrument, it's important to ensure that it consistently measures what it is intended to measure. This consistency is crucial for the instrument's effectiveness. Which option refers to consistent and accurate results?
